THE FATAL SISTERS.

Now the storm begins to lower, (Haste the loom of Heu prepare,)

ν Iron sleet of arrowy shower

See the grisly texture grow, (’Tis of human entrails made 3) And the weights that play below, Each a gasping warrior's head.
